title: DPM Dar meets newly sworn in Iranian President Pezeshkian
content:
TEHRAN, Jul 30 (APP): Deputy Prime Minster and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Tuesday met with the newly sworn in Iranian President Dr. Masoud Pezeshkian after the investiture ceremony held here.
The deputy prime minister conveyed the warmest wishes of Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif and President Asif Ali Zardari on his electoral victory.
He also reaffirmed Pakistan’s commitment to strengthen bilateral relations with Iran.
Dr. Pezeshkian appreciated the felicitation messages and underlined Iran’s commitment to good neighbourly relations.
Deputy Prime Minister Dar also attended the banquet following the investiture ceremony of President Pezeshkian.
He also interacted with Vice President of Brazil Geraldo Alckmin and Chairman of the Majlisi Milli (Tajikistan parliament) Rustam Emomali, and discussed the matters of mutual interest.
